attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: During the Falklands War in 1982 we were tasked by the MOD and Government to sail for the Falklands as part of the Task Force before the surrender. The ships were involved in hazardous mine clearance operations and I believe were overlooked when the criteria was set for the medal. In recognition of the dangerous work I kindly ask the Prime Minister to consider awarding the South Atlantic Medal(without rosette)or a clasp to the GSM1962 to the 3 ships.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
